com.isbx.locationtools

Class GeocodingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isbx.locationtools.GeocodingHelper

  • public class GeocodingHelper
extends Object
    A convenience class for interacting with Android's Geocoder class. Provided are helper methods for performing reverse geocoding operations as well performing address queries with a search string.

    For more advanced location based searching, see the PlacesComponent class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  GeocodingHelper.AddressCallback
      Callback interface to retrieve single addresses from asynchronous operations.
      static interface  GeocodingHelper.AddressListCallback
      Callback interface to retrieve Lists of Addresses from asynchronous operations.

    • Method Detail

      • getAddress

        public void getAddress(double lat,
                       double lng,
                       GeocodingHelper.AddressCallback callback)
        Uses reverse geocoding to retrieve a human readable address for the given coordinates. The result will be parsed into an address string and passed to callback.

        Note: The callback will be executed on the main thread of the application.

        Parameters:
        lat - The latitude coordinate to process
        lng - The longitude coordinate to process
        callback - A GeocodingHelper.AddressCallback that will be notified when the request completes
        See Also:
        Geocoder.getFromLocation(double, double, int)

      • searchAddress

        public void searchAddress(String locationName,
                          double lowerLeftLatitude,
                          double lowerLeftLongitude,
                          double upperRightLatitude,
                          double upperRightLongitude,
                          GeocodingHelper.AddressListCallback callback)
        Searches for addresses that are similar to the specified locationName asynchronously. The search will attempt to limit results to those that lie within the bounds specified. The response is limited to the top 15 results.

        For higher accuracy results, it is recommended to use the Google Places API and PlacesComponent.

        Parameters:
        locationName - The location name to search for
        lowerLeftLatitude - The the lower latitude of the search bounds
        lowerLeftLongitude - The left longitude of the search bounds
        upperRightLatitude - The upper latitude of the search bounds
        upperRightLongitude - The right longitude of the search bounds
        callback - A GeocodingHelper.AddressListCallback to be notified of the results of the request
        See Also:
        Geocoder.getFromLocationName(String, int, double, double, double, double)

      • searchAddress

        public void searchAddress(String locationName,
                          GeocodingHelper.AddressListCallback callback)
        Searches for addresses that are similar to the specified locationName asynchronously. The response is limited to the top 15 results.

        For higher accuracy results, it is recommended to use the Google Places API and PlacesComponent.

        Parameters:
        locationName - The location name to search for
        callback - A GeocodingHelper.AddressListCallback to be notified of the results of the request
        See Also:
        Geocoder.getFromLocationName(String, int)
